title: Paul Merton in China - S01E01 - New UK TV Series on Channel 5
description:
TRAVEL: Paul Merton in China
On: five (5)    
Date: Monday 21st May 2007 (Already shown)
Time: 21:00 to 22:00 (1 hour long)     VideoPlus: 63334

Series following Paul Merton as he travels through China. Paul arrives in Beijing, the start of his own oriental \&#039;Grand Tour\&#039;. He tastes local cuisine at a \&#039;speciality\&#039; restaurant, visits Tiananmen Square, and encounters a peasant who builds robots out of other people\&#039;s scrap. Leaving the capital, he stops by an enormous replica of a French chateau, and takes a tour around one of China\&#039;s last truly communist communes.
(New Episode, Subtitles)
